content.question: You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be six times when it is your turn to speak. You will have a conversation with Huang Licheng, the manager of Guangming Computer Tutoring, about your application to work as an intern in the summer. Prompt 1
